caption.p: UV chromatograms of argan leaves analyzed by UPLC-ESI-HRMS ( A) at 280 nm and ( B) 320 nm. The different compounds were identified during the same run with the ESI-HRMS spectra. 1: Gallic acid; 2: (+)-Gallocatechin; 3: (−)-Epigallocatechin; 4: (+)-Catechin; 5: (−)-Epicatechin; 6: Quercetin-3- O-Glucuronide; 7: Myricetin-3- O-Galactoside; 8: Unknown; 9: Myricitrin; 10: Quercitrin; 11: Quercetin-7- O-rhamnoside; 12: Myricetin; 13: Rutin (Quercetin-3- O-rutinoside); 14: Quercetin.
